Text: @Fatty, how is it, reading comics on an iPad? If I bought one, that would be a main reason I'd use it.

Yeah I plan to do the same when price drops and bugs are worked out. I'd like to be able to take my digital comics with me.

You're very welcome FattyMcButterpants - PS love the name. LOL
How is the screen? I heard its a bit small for comics. Also how is it on the eyes and in bright lights/ direct sunlight?
comics work GREAT for iphone/pad/touch. I read on iphone 3gs, no app, just upload the jpgs as photo albums.
Ive thought about throwing one on my Ipod but since sometimes I find even my computer monitor a bit small - Cant imagine, unless it goes panel by panel...
